Ambedkar Overseas Vidya Nidhi Scholarships for SC is offered for Bachelors, Masters, Ph.D. degree in the field of Eligible courses offered. Having interest to apply for this scholarship is your best step to gain knowledge about the University. The information provided below opens the knowledge box about the scholarship.

Note:

  • Degree: Bachelors, Masters, PhD
  • Provided by: Social Welfare Department (AP)
  • Deadline: Deadline varies
  • Scholarship value: Full Funding, Ten lakhs grant

Eligibility criteria for the Ambedkar Overseas Vidya Nidhi Scholarships for SC:

  • Only Indian nationals are eligible.
  • Applicants whose parental income is less than Rs.6.00 lakhs are eligible.
  • One child of the family shall be eligible under this scheme.
  • All applicants will benefit at least 33% of the awards reserved for all female applicants.
  • Applicants who got the minimum percentage of marks to meet the examination requirements will be selected as each order of
  • candidates can further pursue MBBS, PG Diploma Courses (1 year / 1/2 years) Certified Public Accountant (CPA) Certified Portfolio Manager (CPM).

The Value of the Ambedkar Overseas Vidya Nidhi Scholarships for SC:

Successful candidates of the Ambedkar Overseas Vidya Nidhi Scholarships for SC will be approved Rs.10.00 (5.00 +5.00) lakhs grant in two segments –

  • The First segment of Rs.5.00 lakhs on the creation of landing permit/I-94 i.e., immigration card and
  • The second segments on creation of 1st-semester results.

Benefits of the Ambedkar Overseas Vidya Nidhi Scholarships for SC:

Students are able to avail of an enlightening loan of Rs.5.00 lakhs from any Nationalized Bank with the management of A.P. State Co-Operative Finance Corporation at predominant rates of interest.

For more information visit. Ambedkar Overseas Vidya Nidhi Scholarships
